name: Eldrin Thorne
appearance: Tall and gaunt, with sunken eyes and long silver hair that seems perpetually unkempt. He wears a tattered leather cloak adorned with ancient sigils.

stunts.name: Arcane Insight
stunts.description: Whenever Eldrin uses Arcana to uncover hidden knowledge, he can roll +4.

stunts.name: Shifty Eyes
stunts.description: If Eldrin attempts to avoid detection while moving through ruins or ancient libraries, he can roll +3.

stunts.name: Prophecy's Whisper
stunts.description: Eldrin knows a secret language of prophecies that allows him to predict the outcome of his actions when using Arcana in graveyards or under a blood moon.

quirks: Constantly checking mirrors for reflections of other selves
fears: Loss of control over his magic
desires: Uncovering the lost knowledge of an ancient civilization
Finding a way to undo the curse that binds him

backstory.origin: Born into a lineage of powerful scholars and mages, Eldrin grew up in a secluded tower where forbidden texts were kept safe from prying eyes.
backstory.formativeEvent: During his teenage years, Eldrin accidentally unlocked an ancient ritual that summoned vengeful spirits. The experience left him with fragmented memories and the constant fear that he would be consumed by the very knowledge he sought.
backstory.secret: Eldrin carries a small, cracked amulet passed down from generations of scholars in his family. It is said to contain a fragment of an ancient spirit bound within its core.
backstory.summary: Haunted by the past and driven by a relentless thirst for knowledge, Eldrin wanders the Forgotten Realms, searching for hidden libraries and lost texts that might reveal how to free himself from the curse he unknowingly unleashed.

quirks: Often repeats phrases from ancient texts

item-tome-of-shadows.name: The Tome of Shadows
item-tome-of-shadows.details: Eldrin discovered an ancient tome bound in shadowy leather within the hidden chamber at the Blackspire Ruins. The text speaks of forbidden knowledge and dark rituals that could either free him from his curse or seal it forever.

topic-magic_curse.name: Cursed Knowledge
topic-magic_curse.details: Eldrin gained insight into the nature of his curse and how it might be linked to the knowledge he seeks, deepening his understanding of the dark magic that binds him.
